title: Morgan Smith (rugby league)
text:
Morgan Smith (born 30 April 1998) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a or for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">RFL Championship</a>.
Background.
Morgan Smith is the grandson of the rugby league footballer; <a href="Peter%20Smith%20%28rugby%20league%29">Peter Smith</a>.
Playing Career.
Warrington Wolves.
He has played for the <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>, and on loan from <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> for the <a href="Rochdale%20Hornets">Rochdale Hornets</a> in the <a href="2018%20Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>. Smith has also played for the <a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a> and the <a href="RFL%20Championship">Championship</a>.
Featherstone Rovers.
On 21 Oct 2021 it was reported that he had signed for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">RFL Championship</a>
